wikipedia_page.main: Rama "Sam" Samaraweera (born Smethwick, England, 1926) is a self-taught artist of Sri Lankan heritage living and working in Wales. He specialises in painting wildlife and was inspired by a year working as a keeper at Dudley Zoo. He is probably best known for his picture, "Clouded Leopard", a best-seller as a print.

In the 1970s, the print of Rama Samaraweera's painting Clouded leopard was a best-seller in the USA.

In 2015, 89-year-old artist Rama Samaraweera, who was inspired to paint while a keeper at Dudley Zoo, donated three original oil paintings to the zoo to express his gratitude. His painting Clouded Leopard was a best-selling print in America in the 1970s.
